bug.short_desc: Add static website for browsing the contribs from the catalog

long_desc.thetext:
As part of the new contrib catalog repository [1] we also need a web based interface to easily browse contributions. Therefore the "Available Contributions" wiki page [2] should be superseded by a new static website.
Tasks: * create a new static website * create a script which aggregates data from the contrib-catalog repo and creates an index for the website (runs regularly) * decide where to host/put the content of the new website * cross reference the new website (i.e. change existing contrib section structure, content and hyperlinks if needed)
Website requirements: * use the created index from above as main content source * add filtering/sorting abilities for contribs
[1] http://news.qooxdoo.org/qooxdoo-contrib-2-0-rollout [2] http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/project

Done.
Code "lives" here: contrib-platform.git/catalog-webinterface/...
Website "lives" under: http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/catalog/
Update script resides here: qooxdoo.git/tool/admin/bin/update-catalog-website.sh
